title: The Lost time capsule
creator_credit: Look At It My Way Films, Australian Bicentennial Authority, Heather Ogilvie and Geoffrey Bennett
brief_description: In the year 2088 a group of children discover a time capsule from the Bicentenary year. When opened it shows a short, musical, promotional film with the theme “Living together always”, highlighting the multicultural nature of Australian society, the outdoor life, brief film excerpts from Australia’s modern history, culminating in the creation of a mural by schoolchildren.
